ams.tool
Class AppletBuildDetail

java.lang.Object
  JavaBuild
      ams.tool.AppletBuildDetail
All Implemented Interfaces:
ABconstants
public class AppletBuildDetail
extends JavaBuild
implements ABconstants

This class extends Processing's JavaBuild class to simplify access to some of the processes e.g. compilation.

Author:
Peter Lager
